dk.pervasive.jcaf.util
Class AbstractMonitor

java.lang.Object
  java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
          java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
              dk.pervasive.jcaf.util.AbstractMonitor
All Implemented Interfaces:
RemoteContextClient, RemoteContextMonitor, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, java.rmi.Remote
Direct Known Subclasses:
SCAPTester
public abstract class AbstractMonitor
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements java.lang.Runnable, RemoteContextMonitor

A convinient class for creating various context monitors. Real monitors need to implement the run() and the monitor() methods.

Author:
Jakob Bardram
See Also:
